This was the first trip we had ever made using Airbnbs along the way, so we only realized this was a shared home halfway through the trip. While we were a bit apprehensive at first, in the end the experience was wonderful. We arrived a fair bit later than expected due to traffic in the Chicago area, but Cyndi was still there to greet us and get us situated.
The room was beautifully furnished, the master bed had plenty of pillows, and both rooms had nightstand charging ports for our phones. The two bedrooms are only separated by a curtain, but this didn't pose a huge issue for us since we were only spending a night. There were bottles of water provided as well as a package of Oreos which were greatly appreciated.
The shared bathroom didn't cause any issues either, and was also well stocked with the necessities. Lastly, the sunroom off of the shared living room was amazing. Plenty of breakfast options to get the day started. If you're into our feathered friends, you're in luck as well, bird feeders aplenty.
Thanks again Cyndi, we hope to be back soon!
-Adam, Brenda, and Dorothy from NY
